sources.title: Bunnies And Bonnets (1933)
sources.description: Bunnies And Bonnets is 1933 Krazy Kat cartoon short. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/bunnies-and-bonnets-1933/

metadata.Plot: It's Easter, and so Krazy Kat is selling hot cross buns, while Kitty is painting eggs using an assembly line of hens and rabbits. Then it's time to put on their finest and go to Church.There are plenty of Christmas cartoons, lots of them are suitable for Hallowe'en (although released at any old time of the year), Thanksgiving gets a few, usually with a turkey facing the axe, and Termite Terrace's OLD GLORY is a fine cartoon to show on the Fourth of July. It seems unlikely to me, but I can't think of. any other Easter cartoons.
